about_the_game:
A piece of world literature as a captivating hidden object thriller! As art teacher Walter Hartright, you'll be commissioned to teach the daughters of the quirky millionaire Mr. Fairlie. But on your way to the Fairlie estate, you meet a mysterious woman - and you begin to uncover a series of abysmal family secrets. This thrilling hidden object adventure effortlessly captures the stimulating atmosphere of the famous 1860 written novel by Wilkie Collins takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!

  • Re-live the classic novel written by Wilkie Collins

  • Immerse yourself in Victorian mansions to discover the woman in white

  • Scour beautifully detailed, authentic locations for clues and artifacts

  • Search for clues, uncover secrets, and discover the truth"
detailed_description:
A piece of world literature as a captivating hidden object thriller! As art teacher Walter Hartright, you'll be commissioned to teach the daughters of the quirky millionaire Mr. Fairlie. short_description: Discover the secret of the mysterious woman in white in this hidden object adventure. Based on the 1860 novel by Wilkie Collins, the game takes you into the pompous world of ancient British nobility!
supported_languages:
English*, German
